thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1837
thread.title: Deborah

author: Deborah
title: Deborah
text: i have booked with flighhub on many occasions and have found their attitude and quick responses to be excellent. i recently had an issue where i was charged for flight cancellation and interruption which i did not purchase and within minutes of receiving my confirmation and noticing that i had been charged, i immediately called flighthub and was successful in having that charged removed at no cost to me. they were courteous and quick to resolve my situation. very important to me to have immediate results when my time is valuable to me. thank you flighthub
